Title: Sesame Street: Get Up and Dance
Director: John Ferraro, Mustapha Khan, Ted May
Actors: Caroll Spinney, Bruce Connelly, Martin P. Robinson
Plot: When it's your teddy bear's birthday, you want to celebrate in style! That's why Big Bird is throwing a dance party for Radar. Everyone's getting into the act, and they're doing all their favorite dances - The Airplane, The Dog, T...
